Ungkap Anggaran Janggal, PSI DKI Dapat Kiriman Bunga Dukungan
04 Nov 2019, 04:58 by Taufiq Siddiq, Dwi Arjanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta -Fraksi Partai Solidaritas Indonesia atau PSI DPRD DKI Jakarta mendapatkan beberapa ucapan dukungan dari masyarakat atas pengungkapan anggaran janggal dalam KUA PPAS di rancangan APBD 2020 Jakarta.
Ucapan tersebut disampaikan dalam papan ucapan bunga yang telah berjejer di depan Gedung DPRD DKI di Kebon Sirih Jakarta Pusat, Senin pagi, 4 November 2019.
Dalam karangan bunga tersebut dituliskan sejumlah ucapan terimakasih dan dukukungan kepada PSI, seperti ucapan dari Sahabat PSI yang meminta PSI untuk terus mengawal proses perencanaan anggaran DKI.
"Bro & sis PSI tetap semangat terus mengawal proses penganggaran Jakarta yang harus transparan."
Selain itu juga ada pujian kepada Fraksi PSI yang telah membuka anggaran janggal pembelian lem senilai Rp 82 miliar. "Hey PSI Anak Baru! Biar Lem Jadi Perekat Suara Rakyat. Akan Kami Catat dengan Bolpen Emas."
Fraksi PSI menjadi sorotan setelah salah satu anggota fraksinya William Aditya Sarana membeberkan temuan anggaran janggal di KUA PPAS DKI 2020 seperti lem senilai Rp 82 miliar lalu ballpoint sebesar Rp 124 miliar.
Dalam rapat komisi A Wiliam pun mendapat teguran dari Wakil Ketua Komisi A Inggard Joshua yang berasal dari Fraksi Gerindra.
"Sebagai anggota dewan kita perlu punya rasa harga diri dan punya tata krama dalam rangka menyampaikan aspirasi," katanya.
Inggard menilai William seharusnya tak boleh berkoar-koar kepada masyarakat sebelum anggaran tersebut dibahas oleh DPR bersama pemerintah.
Secata terpisah William menyatakan dirinya membuka anggaran tersebut karena Pemprov DKI Jakarta yang dipimpin Anies menyembunyikan rancangan anggaran yang seharusnya bisa diakses oleh publik.
Hal itu, menurut dia, menutup ruang partisipasi dalam mengawasai uang rakyat. “Kenapa (anggaran) disembunyikan? Beri ruang anggota DPRD mengkritisi. Beri ruang publik berpartisipasi,” kata William soal anggaran janggal tersebut.

Expressing Odd Budget, DKI PSI Receives Support Interest Delivery
04 Nov 2019, 04:58 by Taufiq Siddiq, Dwi Arjanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Jakarta Solidarity Party or PSI DPRD Party's fraction has received several words of support from the public for the disclosure of an odd budget in the KUA PPAS in the Jakarta 2020 APBD draft.
The remarks were conveyed in a flower greeting board that had been lined up in front of the DKI DPRD Building in Kebon Sirih, Central Jakarta, Monday morning, November 4, 2019.
In the wreath was written a number of thanks and support to PSI, such as a statement from the Friends of PSI who asked PSI to continue to oversee the DKI budget planning process.
"Bro & sis PSI remain enthusiastic in continuing to oversee the Jakarta budgeting process which must be transparent."
In addition, there was also praise to the PSI Faction for opening an awkward budget for the purchase of glue worth Rp 82 billion. "Hey PSI New Boy! Let Glue Become the Adhesive of the Voice of the People. We will Note it with a Golden Ballpoint Pen."
The PSI faction was in the spotlight after one of its members, William Aditya Sarana, revealed odd budget findings in the KUA PPAS DKI 2020 such as glue worth Rp. 82 billion, then a ballpoint of Rp. 124 billion.
In the meeting of Commission A William also received a reprimand from Commission A Deputy Chairman Inggard Joshua from the Gerindra Faction.
"As members of the council we need to have a sense of self-worth and have manners in order to convey aspirations," he said.
Inggard considered William should not be able to boast to the public before the budget was discussed by the DPR with the government.
Separately, William stated that he opened the budget because the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government led by Anies hid the draft budget that should be accessible to the public.
That, according to him, closed the space for participation in monitoring public money. "Why (budget) is hidden? Give room for the DPRD members to criticize. Give public space to participate, "William said about the odd budget.
